title: Consider the Role of Different Teams
text: Think about the various perspectives and expertise that different teams bring to the table when classifying data.

title: Legal Team's Expertise
text: The legal team is crucial for ensuring compliance with laws and regulations, but is that the only aspect to consider?

title: Involvement of Other Teams
text: Consider the importance of involving IT, data analysts, and business teams in the classification process.

title: Final Decision
text: Based on the need for diverse expertise, should only the legal team drive the classification process?
